ko_KR {
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: AddressFormat */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryISBNNumber */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryNumber */
    CurrencyElements { 
            "\uFFE6",
            "WON",
            ".",
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: Identification */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: LanguageLibraryUse */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: Measurement */
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "^([yY]|[yY][eE][sS])" }
        NoExpression { "^([nN]|[nN][oO])" }
        YesStr { "yes:y:Y" }
        NoStr { "no:n:N" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: NameFormat */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: NumberElements */
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
            "\u00A4#,##0.#;\u00A4-#,##0.#",
            "#,##0%",
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: TelephoneFormat */
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            AmPmMarkers{
                    "\uC624\uC804",
                    "\uC624\uD6C4",
            }
            DateTimePatterns{
                    "hh:mm:ss aa",
                    "HH:mm:ss",
                    "HH:mm:ss",
                    "HH:mm:ss",
                    "yyyy\uB144 MMM dd\uC77C",
                    "yyyy\uB144 MMMM dd\uC77C EEEE HH\uC2DC mm\uBD84 ss\uCD08",
                    "yyyy\uB144 MMM dd\uC77C",
                    "yy/MMMM/dd",
                    "{1} {0}",
            }
            dayNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "\uC77C",
                            "\uC6D4",
                            "\uD654",
                            "\uC218",
                            "\uBAA9",
                            "\uAE08",
                            "\uD1A0",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "\uC77C\uC694\uC77C",
                            "\uC6D4\uC694\uC77C",
                            "\uD654\uC694\uC77C",
                            "\uC218\uC694\uC77C",
                            "\uBAA9\uC694\uC77C",
                            "\uAE08\uC694\uC77C",
                            "\uD1A0\uC694\uC77C",
                    }
                }
            }
            monthNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            " 1\uC6D4",
                            " 2\uC6D4",
                            " 3\uC6D4",
                            " 4\uC6D4",
                            " 5\uC6D4",
                            " 6\uC6D4",
                            " 7\uC6D4",
                            " 8\uC6D4",
                            " 9\uC6D4",
                            "10\uC6D4",
                            "11\uC6D4",
                            "12\uC6D4",
                            "",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "1\uC6D4",
                            "2\uC6D4",
                            "3\uC6D4",
                            "4\uC6D4",
                            "5\uC6D4",
                            "6\uC6D4",
                            "7\uC6D4",
                            "8\uC6D4",
                            "9\uC6D4",
                            "10\uC6D4",
                            "11\uC6D4",
                            "12\uC6D4",
                            "",
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
